attributes.action: Have different fuel duty charges based on your cars mpg
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To coincide with the governments car tax fees being based upon the cars Co2 emmissions, then use this principle for fuel tax - the more economical the car the less tax you pay per litre and vice versa. This could be done by keeping all fuel receipts and submitting them every year to the Inland Revenue to receive a rebate after cross referencing this with DVLA records to verify vehicles official mpg. Bit of work envolved on our part but worth it to get some money back !!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
